title: Ate nutmeg unknowingly, are my prayers of 40 days invalid? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: so not Meg a person who believes it's Haram goes to dine at a house of Muslims they serve a dish which is well known to contain not Meg and he eats unknowingly would his prayers be unaccepted for 40 days the answer is no he did not know the ruling and therefore Allah would not hold him accountable for that
